channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ND
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ND

item.title: Report E-2024100208
item.description:
Report E-2024100208

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-10T09:22:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-10
  • City: WEST FARGO
  • State: ND
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 19:54 EST on 9/10, XPO-XFG contacted ERTS to report a spill of about 1 cup of "SCA-3080-1 Green" from a 55gal metal drum, impacting the trailer floor. The drum was punctured by a nail in the pallet as loaded by the Shipper. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who cleaned the spill with terminal-issued PPE. The damaged drum will remain in for terminal personnel to manage. ERTS generated waste ID: 217290-1.
